name: Square (Gamicle)
description:
This is my first publishing game on itch.io platform, so please do not judge so strictly.

And I would be really happy if you would support me by your donations, it is only 1$, but that amount of money can change someones life, maybe, actually it will give me motivation to create more games and make it free with donations.

And about the game. It is Hyper Casual game, very minimalistic with one mechanic. Your aim is to reach as much points as you can, avoiding through obstacles.

Thank you a lot for your attention!
